com.filestack.transforms

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filestack.transforms.Transform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvTransform, ImageTransform

    public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for file transformations and conversions.

    • Method Detail

      • url

        public java.lang.String url()
        Generates a URL of the transformation. Includes the related FileLink's policy and signature.
        Returns:
        transformation URL

      • getContent

        public okhttp3.ResponseBody getContent()
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       PolicySignatureException,
                                       ResourceNotFoundException,
                                       InvalidParameterException,
                                       InternalException
        Returns the content of a transformation.
        Returns:
        raw transformation content, streamable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if request fails because of network or other IO issue
        PolicySignatureException - if security is missing or invalid
        ResourceNotFoundException - if handle or API key isn't found
        InvalidParameterException - if any of the task options is malformed
        InternalException - if unexpected error occurs
